page.title: 04LEISURE
page.content: The area around Chiddingly is rural and there is no large town in the vicinity. In the village itself there is one public house,a church and a shop. When people want to go out for an evening they either go to the pub for a drink or they will go into Hailsham to a restaurant. If they want to see a movie however,they must go into Brighton or Eastbourne. There is a cricket field in the village and matches are played by the local club against other teams on Sunday afternoons. There are no other sports facilities and to play squash or tennis the people go to the sports centre in Hailsham.
